content.query:
SELECT count(*)
 FROM [dbo].[er_juror_postgresql]
where address6 is not null;

SELECT count(*)
 FROM [dbo].[er_juror_postgresql]
where fname is null;

SELECT COUNT(*)
 FROM [dbo].[er_juror_postgresql]
where lname is null;

SELECT count(*)
 FROM [dbo].[er_juror_postgresql]
where fname is null and lname is null;

SELECT 
sum ( case when address is null then 1 else 0 end ) add1_empty_cnt,
sum ( case when address2 is null then 1 else 0 end ) add2_empty_cnt,
sum ( case when address3 is null then 1 else 0 end ) add3_empty_cnt,
sum ( case when address4 is null then 1 else 0 end ) add4_empty_cnt
FROM [dbo].[er_juror_postgresql]
 
;

SELECT count(*)
 FROM [dbo].[er_juror_postgresql]
where zip is null;

SELECT count(*)
 FROM [dbo].[er_juror_postgresql]
where address4 is null 
;

SELECT hash_id, count(*)
 FROM [dbo].[er_juror_postgresql]
where address4 is null 
group by hash_id
having count(*)>1;
